summary:
A new manor across the street from the Whiterun stables
DAWNGUARD REQUIRED!!!!!!
descriptionHtml:
Dawnguard Required!!!!!!!!!

ok sorry ive been busy, ill get back to finishing this asap i proimise

OMG 3 ENDORSEMENTS NOW!!!! :) IM GONNA ADD MORE MANNEQUINS IN THE BASEMENT FOR EVERYONES MODDED ARMORS TO CELEBRATE! so check back soon :)

if u try this out please leave some feedback so i can make it better

1 thing first, this isnt a finished version yet, i just want people to kind have a preview i guess of what will be available in a few days.....

all that is left for me to do is finish decorating and the get the book shelves and the weapon racks up and running, then make it companion friendly and make it livable for your spouse.

This house isnt finished yet but i will update it when it is in about a week
pretty much i got tired of all these house mods that go way too over the top and i wanted one that was simple yet elegant, the main hall is basically a refitted version of dragons reach but every other room ive custom made and each has its own style, but i really tried to make it seem like it is still matching its exterior as much as possible

the house isnt going to be overly decorated, im making several surfaces in areas they fit in so u can put your objects on them to show them off and decorate the house how you want it


so this house is a bit big but not too big, there is 3 cells, each cell will only have 2-3 rooms each and im not making it so big u can get lost, the place is extremely easy to navigate and i make each area unique so every room has its own feel, and you know exactly where you are in each room

pretty much all i have to do is the fine detialing of each room then it will be done, if you update to the finished version once i upload it remove everything from the house just to be safe, im not exactly sure how all that works yet, but ive made all containers safe to put things in and all mannequins work, ive tested each one out

Features:
26 mannequins all nicely put in their own exhibit to show off each set of armor(weapon racks comming soon, and each area labeled so you know which armor to put where)
Library to store all the books you can find(shelves dont work yet) it has a slight snow elf style to it :P
Nice bedroom with a vault to store your rare items
Nice big hall pretty much taken after dragons reach and turned into a nice exhibit area with statues
Dining room
Basement with smelter and 5 more bonus mannequins :D
Alchemy table
Enchanting table
Amazing Views
Lots of Storage....More comming soon

If anyone has any suggestions of a new room they want added just let me know,
and i use that mannequin mod that keeps them from walking around and stuff, ill find the link to it later lol
and to have your spouse live here with you use this mod
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370
author: Anthonyr87
